template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the education space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Create a multi-channel campaign on effective study skills by first researching student pain points, then producing consistent blog posts, videos, and social content aimed at increasing webinar sign-ups by 15%.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a single-sentence prompt under 45 words for an education content campaign that includes research, multi-format creation, channel consistency, and measurable goals. 

I need to make sure all elements are covered concisely. Let me start by identifying the core components: research, multi-format content, cross-channel consistency, and measurable outcomes. 

The education space suggests focusing on a specific topic, like study skills. I can structure it as a campaign task that begins with research, produces various content types, maintains brand voice, and ties to KPIs. 

Keeping it under 45 words means avoiding extra details. The sentence should flow naturally while hitting all points. Maybe start with the action ("Create a campaign...") and weave in the requirements.
